Method Detail

colorConfig

public final String colorConfig(Integer col,
                                String input)
Colors the entered String black or white, depending on the provided background color. This method is used to output the color config into IRC

Parameters:
col - the color for the background (fg will become white or black)
input - the message to color
Returns:
coloredMessage

makeBold

public final String[] makeBold(String[] ircOutput)
This method is used to add the bold code in front of every line in the ircOutput.

Parameters:
ircOutput - String[] with the lines to forward into IRC
Returns:
String[] with every line preceded by bold code character

postProcessColoredRow

public final String postProcessColoredRow(String row)
Makes colored ASCII output smooth. Post procession is done as if the row were plain (without CC's) Color Codes are removed, row is processed and the Colors are added again.

Parameters:
row - to process
Returns:
the processed line

postProcessRow

public final String postProcessRow(String row)
Makes plain ASCII output smooth.

Parameters:
row - to process
Returns:
the processed line
